Text: Avidyne is a company making computer flight screen, aka the PFD and MFD.  I don't think they make any aircraft, this might be a training kit for the flight display.  I am downloading it now and going to test it out.  Will post once I have a look at it.
Confirmed it is a trainer only.  You do not need FS2004 to run it. It is a standalone program and really help out if you are flying the Cirrus airplane.
